title: KDP Keyword Research for Halloween No Content and Low Content Books to Increase Online Profits
description:

To make money online with KDP no content and low content books it is important that your books appear before customers, on Amazon, and are found in the search results. Halloween is a popular niche but keyword research suggests that not only is it profitable but there is less competition if you pick the correct buyer keywords. IN this video I show you my strategy of keyword research and how to pick the best high search low competition keywords in this niche and so maximize the chances of you making a profit with your books and collecting those royalties.
